name: Descending (itch) (elvismd, Ivan Garcia FIlho)
description:
An Angel falls from the sky opening a pathway directly to Hell. What do you do?

You go deep down below and slain demons and creatures along the way while being careful not to FALL TO DEATH.

Reach the depths of the tower where the Angel fell and fight the devil that awaits you.

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrows and Space (Stick axis and A button)
    • Movement / Jump / Double Jump
  • X or K  (Right Bump)
    • Attack
  • Esc or P (Start Button)
    • Pause

Ludum Dare 48 entry, by :

  • Elvis Leite;
  • Ivan Garcia;
